CustomField.description: Reference to custom label to display help text for field like Placeholder, First Picklist Option...For checkbox group it is comma separated list in format ValueToDisplay|fieldname like USA|VAS_CORUSA5G__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Reference to custom label to display help text for field like Placeholder, First Picklist Option...For checkbox group it is comma separated list in format ValueToDisplay|fieldname like USA|VAS_CORUSA5G__c
CustomField.label: Help Text (Custom Label Ref)
